Title: Smoke & Mirrors (Price Reduced!)
Body (HTML):
Get it while it lasts! This favorite is on sale and will go away soon!

Mood: Woody. Velvety. Leathery.

  • Top Notes: Sandalwood, Leather

  • Middle Notes: Papyrus, Virginia Cedar, Cardamom

  • Base Notes: Violet, Iris, Amber

Sandalwood and leather kick things off with some serious swagger, while cardamom and cedar keep it grounded and warm. Then—surprise—a soft touch of violet and iris sneaks in, all wrapped up in cozy amber. It’s got that just-right mix of bold and mellow, perfect for when you want to make an impression without trying too hard.
Product Category: Health & Beauty > Personal Care > Cosmetics > Perfume & Cologne

Title: Calm Down
Body (HTML):
Inspired By: Mandarin Oriental Hotel

  • Top notes: Green Bamboo, Cucumber, Turkish Rose

  • Middle notes: Bergamot,Jasmine, Water Lily, Melon

  • Base notes: Sandalwood, Patchouli

Mood: Fresh. Dewy. Refined.

Green bamboo and cucumber hit first—crisp and refreshing, like diving into a pool on a hot day. Turkish rose follows with a soft, feminine touch that’s as inviting as it is elegant. Then, bergamot, jasmine, and water lily bring a floral breeze that’s both uplifting and irresistible. The finish? Melon adds a light, juicy sweetness, while sandalwood and patchouli ground everything with a warm, earthy vibe. It’s fresh, flirty, and totally unforgettable—perfect for turning any room into a calming escape.

Title: Zest & The City
Body (HTML):
Inspired By: 24k Magic

  • Top Notes: Bergamot, Lemon, Lemongrass

  • Mid Notes: Magnolia, Jasmine, Lily

  • Base Notes: Koa Wood, Musk

Bergamot, lemon, and lemongrass burst in like a fresh breeze—bright, zesty, and instantly uplifting. But just when you think it’s all light and airy, magnolia, jasmine, and lily enter the scene, adding a floral richness that’s as bold as it is beautiful. The finish? Koa wood and musk make their entrance, grounding everything with a soft, sensual warmth that sticks around just long enough to make an impression. It’s the scent you wear when you want to feel like sunshine with a side of mystery.

Mood: Bright. Polished. Refined

Title: Peach Tease
Body (HTML):
Inspired By: E11even Hotel Miami

  • Top Notes: White Peach, Bergamot, Lilac

  • Middle Notes: Ylang Ylang, Calone, Cyclamen

  • Base Notes: Musk, Sandalwood, Vanilla Bean, Patchouli

White peach, bergamot, and lilac burst in like a juicy summer day—light, fresh, and irresistibly sweet. But don’t be fooled—ylang ylang, calone, and cyclamen keep things intriguing, adding a touch of mystery beneath all that brightness. As it settles, musk, sandalwood, vanilla bean, and patchouli wrap everything up in a smooth, sensual embrace that lingers just a little too long. It’s the scent that says, “I’m sweet, but I’ve got layers.”

Mood: Soft. Creamy. Polished.

Title: Naughty & Nice

  • Top Notes: Cardamom, Leather, Lemon

  • Middle Notes: Cinnamon, Oud Wood, Sandalwood

  • Base Notes: Amber, Musk, Vetiver

Then, cinnamon, oud wood, and sandalwood slide in, giving the whole thing an exotic, "I dare you to keep up" kind of vibe. But the best part? Amber, musk, and vetiver finish it off with a smooth, earthy depth that hangs around long after you’ve left the room. It’s the scent that says, “I’m here to steal the spotlight—and I’ll make it look effortless.”

Geranium, sea salt, and grapefruit burst in like a coastal breeze—fresh, vibrant, and totally energizing. Sage and seaweed flow in next, giving off that earthy, “I just came from the ocean” vibe. And as it settles, a smooth blend of grapefruit, cedar, and lily takes over, adding a touch of warmth and depth that keeps things interesting. It’s like stepping into a sun-drenched afternoon by the sea—fresh, free, and ready to turn heads.

A sultry swirl of nutmeg, sandalwood, and musk that lingers just long enough to keep ‘em guessing. Perfect for turning any room from meh to damn—no effort required.

But the real magic happens when sweet praline, musk, frankincense, and agarwood slide in, creating an intoxicating, luxurious finish that lingers like an unforgettable night. It’s the scent that says, “I’ve got secrets... and you’re about to want to know them.”

Amber, musk, and blonde woods finish everything off with a smooth, sensual depth that lingers just long enough to leave a lasting impression. Title: On Par
Body (HTML):
A GILDED EXOTICS COLLECTION

Inspired By: Tom Ford, Ombre Leather

  • Top Notes: Violet Leaf, and Cedar

  • Middle Notes: Jasmine Sambac, and Orris

  • Base Notes: Leather, Woody Notes, and Tobacco

It opens like a stolen glance—cool violet leaf and smoky cedar brushing past you with an effortless edge. Then, jasmine sambac and orris bloom—soft, silky, and just a little undone, like someone slipping out of their silk robe.

But the real seduction starts at the base: leather, deep woods, and a whisper of tobacco that lingers like the memory of last night on your skin. Warm. Intimate. Addictive.

This isn’t just a scent. It’s a slow burn. And darling, you’ll want to let it linger.

Mood: Leathery. Elegant. Modern.

At the heart, rose and lily-of-the-valley mix with black pepper to keep things spicy and intriguingly floral. Finally, patchouli, ambergris, and bourbon vanilla bring the wild side—smoky, smooth, and irresistibly addictive.

Living Bold. Refined. Untamed.

By the time Ceylon cinnamon kicks in, you're already in too deep. Grounded by smoky Chinese black tea, warm ambroxan, and a touch of holy olibanum, Imaginasty doesn’t just scent the room—it leaves stories behind.

For the chill ones who secretly indulge.

It’s the kind of scent that flirts hard but plays nice—just like you.

Title: Scent Blotter Pack
Body (HTML):
A little foreplay for your fragrance.

Not ready to commit? We like to tease too. The Whiffer Blotter Pack is your scent discovery library — a curated collection of our most irresistible oils, each flirtatiously dabbed onto blotter strips so you can sniff, swoon, and seduce at your own pace.

Whether you're shopping for your space or your alter ego, this is the no-strings-attached way to find the one. Or two. Or three. We don't judge.

What’s inside:

  • Scent names, notes, and cheeky context to guide your sniff sesh

  • Comes packed and labeled like the sexy little scent library it is.

  • Resealable bags for whiffing resource when it’s time to reorder

Why you’ll love it:

  • No commitment issues here – Just a little sampling before the big pour.

  • Find your match – From clean and crisp to dark and dangerous.

  • Makes scents as a gift – For friends, clients, lovers… or yourself (especially yourself).

Smell first. Fall hard later.

The Blotter Pack is where your Whiffed romance begins.
Product Category: Health & Beauty > Personal Care > Cosmetics > Perfume & Cologne

Title: Toxica
Body (HTML):
Inspired By: Gris, Dior

  • Top Notes: Bergamot and Grapefruit

  • Middle Notes: Rose, Strawberry, Jasmine, Orange Blossom and Ylang-Ylang

  • Base Notes: Patchouli, Oakmoss, Sandalwood, Amber, Cedar and White Musk

Starts with a hit of bergamot and grapefruit — sharp, juicy, and impossible to ignore. Then comes the sweet sting: rose, jasmine, strawberry, orange blossom, and ylang-ylang blooming with bold intent. The dry-down wraps it all in patchouli, oakmoss, sandalwood, and amber, grounded by cedar and a whisper of white musk.

Bold. Addictive. Bad for boundaries. Toxica — and proud of it.

Mood: Structured. Timeless. Crisp
Product Category: Health & Beauty > Personal Care > Cosmetics > Perfume & Cologne

Title: Unbuttoned Intentions
Body (HTML):
Inspired By: Bleu, Chanel

  • Top notes: Grapefruit, Lemon, Mint, Pink Pepper

  • Middle notes: Ginger, Nutmeg, Jasmine, Iso E Super

  • Base notes: Incense, Vetiver, Cedar, Sandalwood, Patchouli, Labdanum, White Musk

Crisp citrus. Cool mint. A spark of pink pepper. Unbuttoned Intentions doesn’t ease in — it walks in late and leaves the door open. Ginger and nutmeg bring the heat, softened by jasmine and a dose of Iso E Super that clings like sweat on skin. Then the dry-down hits: incense, vetiver, and patchouli smolder beneath sandalwood, labdanum, and a low hum of musk. It’s bold, magnetic, and just the right amount of reckless.

Smells like confidence. Stays like trouble.

Mood: Fresh. Masculine. Modern.
Product Category: Health & Beauty > Personal Care > Cosmetics > Perfume & Cologne

Title: The Influencer
Body (HTML):
Inspired By: Le Jour se Lève, Louis Vuitton

  • Top notes: Grapefruit, Mandarin Orange, Orange, Bergamot, Black Currant

  • Middle notes: Lily-of-the-Valley, Jasmine Sambac, Green Notes, Osmanthus, Magnolia, Peony, Rose

  • Base notes: White Musk, Iso E Super, Vanillin, Vanilla

Citrus hits first — grapefruit, mandarin, bergamot, and black currant bursting brighter than a ring light. Then comes the floral filter: jasmine, rose, peony, and magnolia blended smoother than a sponsored post. Vanilla, Iso E Super, and white musk finish with that soft-focus glow — addictive, algorithm-approved, and impossible to scroll past.

Built for double-taps. Backed by serious backend.

Not just trending — setting the trend.

Mood: Fresh. Polished. Romantic.
Product Category: Health & Beauty > Personal Care > Cosmetics > Perfume & Cologne

Title: Clean Getaway
Body (HTML):
Inspired By: Neroli Portofino, Tom Ford

  • Top notes: Bergamot, Mandarin Orange, Lemon, Bitter Orange, Lavender, Rosemary, Myrtle

  • Middle notes: African Orange Flower, Neroli, Jasmine, Pittosporum (Orange Flower)

  • Base notes: Amber, Angelica, Ambrette (Musk Mallow)

Citrus and herbs make the first move — bergamot, lemon, bitter orange, and rosemary all crisp, cool, and freshly shaven. But then comes the heat: neroli, jasmine, and orange blossom bloom with that sun-warmed, skin-close sweetness. The base lingers soft and sensual — amber, ambrette, and angelica giving it that clean-but-not-innocent finish.

It smells like its been up to something, and got away with it.

Mood: Bright. Coastal. Refined.
Product Category: Health & Beauty > Personal Care > Cosmetics > Perfume & Cologne

Title: Stains & Alibis
Body (HTML):
Inspired By: Sur la Route, Louis Vuitton

  • Top notes: Citruses (Calabrian Bergamot, Lemon, Other Citruses), Pink Pepper

  • Middle notes: Grass, Nutmeg, Hedione, Cardamom

  • Base notes: Leather, Cedar, Patchouli, Peru Balsam, Iso E Super

Starts off fresh — citrus, pink pepper, and just enough charm to get away with it. Then the green creeps in: grass, cardamom, and nutmeg blurring the line between playful and planned. It all dries down to leather and patchouli with a soft ambered edge, thanks to Iso E Super and Peru balsam.

Smells like you’ve been rolling in the wrong kind of fun — and have the perfect excuse for it.

Mood: Vibrant. Polished. Earthy.
Product Category: Health & Beauty > Personal Care > Cosmetics > Perfume & Cologne

Title: Peel Me Later
Body (HTML):
Inspired By: Oyedo, Diptyque

  • Top notes: Mandarin Orange, Yuzu, Lemon, Lime

  • Middle notes: Thyme

  • Base notes: Woodsy Notes

Lemon, lime, mandarin, and yuzu burst in like they own the place — juicy, bright, and unapologetically loud. Then thyme slips underneath, herbaceous and just a little wicked. The base? Clean woods that don’t try too hard but know exactly what they’re doing.

Fresh, flirty, and gone before you know what hit you.

Mood: Zesty. Crisp. Minimal.
Product Category: Health & Beauty > Personal Care > Cosmetics > Perfume & Cologne

Title: Glacial Intent
Body (HTML):
Inspired By: Silver Mountain Water, Creed

  • Top notes: Bergamot, Mandarin Orange, Neroli

  • Middle notes: Green Tea, Blackcurrant

  • Base notes: Musk, Sandalwood, Petitgrain, Galbanum

Icy citrus and blackcurrant hit first — sharp, clean, and hard to read. Then comes the green tea drift, smooth and cool like it’s keeping secrets. Musk and sandalwood follow close behind, softening the edges but never losing the chill.

Fresh, controlled, and quietly disarming.

Mood: Bright. Herbal. Composed.
Product Category: Health & Beauty > Personal Care > Cosmetics > Perfume & Cologne

Title: Woods For Thought
Body (HTML):
Inspired By: H24, Hermès

  • Top Notes: Sandalwood, Leather

  • Middle Notes: Papyrus, Virginia Cedar, Cardamom

  • Base Notes: Violet, Iris, Amber

Starts off like it’s got its life together—clean, crisp clary sage with a hint of smug. Rosewood follows, smooth and buttoned-up, but narcissus flashes a little skin. Then it all unravels—moss, amber, and woods take over, warm, dirty, and way too easy to say yes to.

Smells like brains, brawn, and just enough bad idea to keep things interesting.

Mood: Smooth. Woody. Sophisticated.
Product Category: Health & Beauty > Personal Care > Cosmetics > Perfume & Cologne

Title: Big D
Body (HTML):
Inspired By: Explorer, Montblanc

  • Top notes: Bergamot, Pink Pepper, Clary Sage

  • Middle notes: Haitian Vetiver, Leather

  • Base notes: Ambroxan, Akigalawood, Indonesian Patchouli Leaf, Cacao Pod

This one walks in and owns the room. Bergamot and pink pepper bring the bite, clary sage smooths it out like a tailored smirk. Then comes that quiet authority: Haitian vetiver and leather, grounded and unapologetic. The dry-down lingers with ambroxan, patchouli, and cacao — dark, warm, and magnetic in all the right ways.

It’s not about size. It’s about presence. Big D. As in Demeanor… obviously.

Mood: Fresh, Comforting, Confident
Product Category: Health & Beauty > Personal Care > Cosmetics > Perfume & Cologne

Title: Sweet On Arrival
Body (HTML):
Inspired By: Acqua di Gioia, Giorgio Armani

  • Top notes: Lemon (Primofiore Amalfi Lemon), Mint (Crushed Mint Leaves)

  • Middle notes: Water Jasmine, Peony, Pink Pepper

  • Base notes: Cedarwood, Brown Sugar, Labdanum

It opens like a flirt — zesty Amalfi lemon and mint that’s more lips than leaves. Then the bloom hits: water jasmine, peony, and pink pepper giving soft, dewy trouble. The base? Cedarwood and labdanum, warmed by brown sugar that melts just enough to make things interesting.

Fresh, flirty, and already three steps ahead of you.

Mood: Crisp. Aquatic. Balanced.
Product Category: Health & Beauty > Personal Care > Cosmetics > Perfume & Cologne

Title: Velvet Vice
Body (HTML):
A GILDED EXOTICS COLLECTION

Inspired By: Blanc, Lacoste

  • Top Notes: Grapefruit, Rosemary, and Cardamom

  • Middle Notes: Ylang-Ylang and Tuberose

  • Base Notes: Suede, Virginia Cedar, Vetiver, and Leather

Starts off all charm—grapefruit snaps, rosemary teases, and cardamom purrs. But don’t be fooled by the fresh talk. Ylang-ylang and tuberose roll in next, lush and a little too hands-on, turning the scent downright flirtatious. Then comes the real kink: suede, vetiver, cedar, and leather melt together into a slow, bright seduction that clings like a secret you don’t want forgiven.

Clean cut up top. All trouble underneath.

Mood: Bright. Smooth. Zesty

Title: Barely Petaled
Body (HTML):
Inspired By: W Hotel

  • Top Notes: Jasmine, Neroli, and Perilla

  • Middle Notes: Rose , Lemon, Peony

  • Base Notes: Musk

Jasmine and neroli drape over perilla like silk sheets on sun-warmed skin. Then comes the tease: rose, lemon, and peony twirl in, floral and fizzy, like champagne on a scandalous afternoon. And just when it feels too innocent, musk slides in beneath it all—clean, skin-like, and just suggestive enough to raise an eyebrow.

It’s not a bouquet. It’s bait.

Mood: Fresh, Delicate, Zesty

Size matters

Title: Savagé AF
Body (HTML):
A GILDED EXOTICS COLLECTION

Inspired By: Sauvage, Dior

  • Top Notes: Calabrian Bergamot, and Pepper

  • Middle Notes: Sichuan Pepper, Lavender, Pink Pepper, Vetiver, Patchouli, Geranium, and Elemi

  • Base Notes: Ambroxan, Cedar, and Labdanum

Zesty bergamot and spicy pepper open the show, then it dives into a smoky-smooth swirl of lavender, patchouli, and vetiver. Grounded by warm cedar and ambroxan, this scent doesn’t follow rules—it makes its own. Clean, wild, and a little dangerous.

Mood: Fresh. Bold. Precise

Title: Saint & Sinner
Body (HTML):
A GILDED EXOTICS COLLECTION

Inspired By: New Look, Dior

  • Top Notes: Aldehydes

  • Middle Notes: Frankincense

  • Base Notes: Amber

Walks in with a halo—then sets the room on fire. Scent opens with aldehydes so clean they practically confess for you, but don’t be fooled. Frankincense rolls in next, dark and reverent like incense in a locked-door chapel. And when the amber hits? It’s game over—warm, golden, and clinging tscent like a secret you swore you'd never tell.

Smells like redemption. Feels like temptation.

Mood: Sultry. Smoldering. Luminous

Size Matters

  • 10ml: Perfect size for Mobile One or Mobile Two

Title: Black
Body (HTML):
Inspired By: Le Labo, Santal 33

  • Top Notes: Cardamom, Violet, Iris

    Middle Notes: Sandalwood, Papyrus, Virginia Cedar

    Base Notes: Leather, Amber

Once you back Black, you never go back.

Black is the bad habit you’ll brag about. It opens with a kick of cardamom heat, cooled off by a sly wink of iris and violet—sharp, sexy, a little dangerous. Then the woods take over: sandalwood and cedar laying down a creamy, smoky rhythm that pulls you closer. The finale? Leather, papyrus, and amber that stick around like a lover who won’t leave your sheets.

Not polite. Not safe. Just devastatingly good.

Mood: Woody. Leathered. Seductive.
Product Category: Health & Beauty > Personal Care > Cosmetics > Perfume & Cologne

Title: Mobile Two
Body (HTML):
Say hello to the Mobile Two Portable Scent Diffuser — your on-the-go whiffer built for the road, the ride, and wherever life takes you. Car? Airbnb? Tiny hotel room with mysterious smells? Handled.

Made from high-quality aluminum and with a built-in working timer (up to 4 hours), it’s sleek, quiet, and compact enough to slip into your car cup holder or desktop; it’s always ready to roll. Whether you’re chasing zen on a long commute, need a scent to relax you during the work day, or want to bring spa vibes to your suitcase, Mobile Two keeps your air as fresh as your playlist.

Title: Polymer One
Body (HTML):
Polymer One — up high, out of sight, all the scent.

Hugs your wall like it was built to be there, but will also be happy on a shelf. With a generous 400ml oil chamber and waterless diffusion, it fills your space with pure, undiluted fragrance that lingers like a compliment whispered in passing.

Whether you’re scenting a boutique, a large space, or an entryway that deserves a little drama, this diffuser makes it effortless and elevated.
Product Category: Health & Beauty > Personal Care > Cosmetics > Perfume & Cologne

Title: Twosome
Body (HTML):
Twosome — two scent nozzles, one mission, total scent domination.

With two 50ml diffusers, it delivers pure scents from both ends — because sometimes, one just isn’t enough. No water. No drama. Just bold, beautiful scenting.

Add the same scent or two different ones and switch it up anytime via the app or the onboard controls.

Whether you’re dressing up a spa, a studio, or your scandalously good-smelling living room, this diffuser is here to serve double the vibes in half the effort.

Title: [Oils] Top Two Designer Scent Bundle
Body (HTML):
Don’t stress selecting the best scent (they’re all amazing!). Instead, allow us to pick for you based on popular scents from the collection.

Indulge in fragrance luxury with Whiffed Aromas Designer-Inspired Collection — where scents from your favorite designer meets everyday ambiance elegance. Each oil in our curated lineup captures the essence of high-end designer perfumes. Potent, IFRA-certified, and crafted with clean, high-quality ingredients — no synthetic fillers, just authentic aromatic artistry.

From woodsy & musky whispers to vibrant citrus or lush florals — there’s a scent to match your mood, your space, or your style. Every blend is designed to diffuse beautifully through any Whiffed Aromas machine, creating an immersive, upscale atmosphere in your home, office, car, or beyond.

Let us help you decide which bottle size to select based on the Whiff Maker [Diffuser] model.

  • 10ml: Perfect size for Mobile One or Mobile Two

  • 150ml: Works for either Fusion 200 (200ml) or Twosome (100ml).

  • 500ml: Fills up Fusion 500 (500ml) and Polymer One (400ml) to satisfaction, with more left for later.

View a complete list of all machines here.
Product Category: Health & Beauty > Personal Care > Cosmetics > Perfume & Cologne

Title: [Oils] Top Two Gilded Exotics Scent Bundle
Body (HTML):
Don’t stress selecting the best scent (they’re all amazing!). Instead, allow us to pick for you based on popular scents from the collection.

Step into an elevated world of scent with the Gilded Exotics Collection, exclusively from Whiffed Aromas. These are not just fragrance oils—they’re luxury perfume oils sourced from Switzerland, masterfully reformulated in the Emirates for the air. Every note is thoughtfully reimagined to bring you designer-level sophistication, refined richness, and bold aroma — without compromise.

Each scent in the Gilded Exotics line is tailored to work seamlessly with any Whiffed Aromas diffuser. Whether you favor deep woody musk, radiant florals, or something daringly exotic, this collection delivers. Expect clarity in the high notes, fullness in the heart, and a lasting finish that transforms your space into something unforgettable.

Because you deserve to smell exceptional—your environment should keep up and let your space tell your story.
